name: Curiosity Killed the Cat
description:
You are the King's Chief Sorcerer.

He has requested you Perform some Sacrifices. Each sacrifice requires one bone, one plant, and one cat. The king will write his request down on the scroll at the top of the screen. Explore the castle and grounds in order to find these resources. Press 'e' near one to pick it up. Go to the top of the altar to deliver your items (e). If you pick up the wrong item, you may dispose of it in the trash can in the throne room (e). Once you have completed the king's request, return to the throne room to receive a new task. Make sure to wash off the altar with the water bucket (e). You can return the bucket to where you got it from after.

(P.S. Our highscore was 14. Can you beat us?)

This game was created using the Godot engine for the 2021 Spooktober Jam which had the theme of sacrifice.

The team included ProphecyOak (myself) and Acemyth.

Third-Party Assets we used included:

  • Font "Thaleah Fat" by Tiny Worlds
  • Art "PIPOYA FREE RPG TILESET 16x16 Pixel" by Pipoya 
  • Song "8-bit win" by Heatleybros
  • Song "Itty bitty" by Kevin MacLeod
  • SFX "The Essential video Game Sound effects collection" by Juhani Junkala
